testcase.name: ReadData

failure.message: The TCP/IP connection to the host 192.168.1.5, port 1434 has failed. Error: "Connection refused: connect. Verify the connection properties, check that an instance of SQL Server is running on the host and accepting TCP/IP connections at the port, and that no firewall is blocking TCP connections to the port.".
